item.title: Workspace App errors in US region
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Intermittent Workspace Login Issues in US Region

We are currently experiencing intermittent issues with Workspace login in the US deployment region. Our engineering team is investigating this issue to determine the cause of the platform downtime. Inbound and Outbound calls are not affected. We will provide an update within 30 minutes. Summary: Issues with Workspace login are being investigated, with no impact on calls.

Mar 5, 20:48 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing intermittent issues with Workspace login in the US deployment region. Inbound and Outbound calls are not affected. We are investigating this issue alongside our engineering team. We will update the page within 30 minutes.

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance Update
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Platform Maintenance Scheduled Summary: Talkdesk will be conducting platform maintenance during the specified hours to make infrastructure enhancements to increase platform resiliency. Users should expect two short periods of routing impact during the maintenance.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 3, 09:00 - 10:30 UTC

Feb 29, 10:14 UTC
Scheduled - Talkdesk will be conducting platform maintenance during the hours of 09:00 - 10:30 UTC (02:00 - 03:30 PDT) on Sunday, March 3rd, 2024.

During this maintenance window, infrastructure enhancements will be made to increase platform resiliency.

What can users expect during the maintenance period?

During the maintenance period, US region deployment users we will have two short periods of time where routing will be affected, ongoing calls will be maintained.

This page will be updated throughout the maintenance.

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance Update
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Platform Maintenance Scheduled

Summary: Talkdesk will be conducting platform maintenance to make infrastructure enhancements and increase platform resiliency. Some US regional deployment users might be required to log in again.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 25, 09:00 - 10:00 UTC

Feb 20, 15:12 UTC
Scheduled - Talkdesk will be conducting platform maintenance during the hours of 09:00 - 10:00 UTC (02:00 - 03:00 PDT) on Sunday, February 25th, 2024.

During this maintenance window, infrastructure enhancements will be made to increase platform resiliency.

What can users expect during the maintenance period?

During this maintenance window, some US regional deployment users might be required to log in again.

This page will be updated throughout the maintenance.

item.title: Live reporting degraded performance in US region
item.content:encoded:
Feb 13, 16:52 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 13, 16:44 UTC
Monitoring - Mitigation was applied and we are seeing system recovery. We will keep monitoring the system and provide an update in 15 min.

Feb 13, 16:28 UTC
Identified - We are experiencing degraded performance with the Contacts Widget Live reporting in the US deployment region. Inbound and Outbound calls are not affected. As a workaround, the Recent Activity Multichannel dashboard in Explore can be used. Mitigation measures are currently in progress we will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

item.title: Conversation APP Degraded performance
item.content:encoded:
Jan 2, 21:53 UTC
Resolved - At this point, mitigation measures were applied and we are seeing full system recovery. Call routing was not affected.

Jan 2, 21:49 UTC
Monitoring - A fix as been implemented. We are currently monitoring the system.

Jan 2, 21:28 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating a subset of customers with difficulties loading the Conversations APP in US deployment region. Mitigation measures are in progress

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance Update
item.content:encoded:
Dec 17, 10:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 17, 09:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 13, 09:31 UTC
Scheduled - Talkdesk will be conducting platform maintenance during the hours of 09:00 - 10:00 UTC (02:00 - 03:00 PDT) on Sunday, December 17th, 2023.

During this maintenance window, infrastructure enhancements will be made to increase platform resiliency.

What can users expect during the maintenance period?

Live Reporting:

During this maintenance window, Live Reporting will present an error panel for users on US regional deployment. Live Reporting will recover by itself at the end of the intervention.

Talkdesk ID:

During this maintenance window, EU regional deployment users might be required to log in again.

This page will be updated throughout the maintenance.

item.title: EU Region calls failing
item.content:encoded:
Nov 10, 11:35 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 10, 11:21 UTC
Monitoring - Mitigation measures are being applied by our carrier partner and at this point, we are seeing improvements in the success rate of inbound and outbound calls. We are continuously working with our partner in order to recover the service as quickly as possible. We will share more updates as soon as available.

Nov 10, 10:44 UTC
Update - Currently one of our telecommunications carriers in Europe is experiencing an incident which is causing a percentage of calls to fail. This incident does not affect customers with BYOC. We are working with our partner in order to recover the service as quickly as possible. We will share one update in 60 minutes or sooner.

Nov 10, 10:19 UTC
Update - Currently one of our telecommunications carriers in Europe is experiencing an incident which is causing a percentage of calls to fail. We are working with our partner in order to recover the service as quickly as possible. We will share an update in 30 minutes.

Nov 10, 10:03 UTC
Identified - Currently one of our carriers in Europe is experiencing an incident which is causing a percentage of calls to fail. We are working together with our partner to recover the service. We will share more updates as soon as possible.

item.title: EU Region Assignment System Issue
item.content:encoded:
Sep 29, 17:30 UTC
Resolved - We are investigating the assignment system and inbound call issues in the EU regional deployment. Customers with business continuity configured are advised to enable the same. Mitigation measures are currently in progress. We will provide an update in 30 min or sooner. Please note that this does not impact customers on other regional deployments.

A fix has been implemented and we are seeing system improvements. At this point, customers can disable Business continuity settings. We will keep monitoring.

This incident has been resolved.

item.title: Live contacts latency in US region
item.content:encoded:
Aug 25, 17:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 25, 17:32 UTC
Monitoring - We have implemented mitigation measures and are seeing recovery. We will update you in 30 minutes or as soon as we are fully recovered.

Aug 25, 17:24 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue impacting Live data freshness, there is latency in all Contact related data in the US region. This is not impacting any calls or call routing functionality, only the Live data. Our engineering team is currently applying mitigation measures. We will provide an update within 30 minutes.

item.title: Live reporting data latency in Us region
item.content:encoded:
Aug 15, 04:29 UTC
Resolved - We are currently fully recovered from the latency and live data is currently up to date on contacts-related data widgets. Some
queued calls from earlier today can show up on the contact list, these calls will be closed over the next 24h.

Aug 15, 03:47 UTC
Update - We are currently fully recovered from the latency and live data is currently up to date on contacts-related data widgets. We will keep monitoring.

Aug 14, 23:46 UTC
Monitoring - Mitigation measures were applied and we are seeing recovery. We expect to fully recover from the latency in 1 hour or sooner. We will keep monitoring.

Aug 14, 23:35 UTC
Update - Mitigation measures were applied and we are currently recovering from the latency, this impacts only contacts-related data widgets. No impact on calls, routing, or any of the critical functionality. We will provide an update within 30 minutes or sooner.

Aug 14, 22:35 UTC
Update - Mitigation measures are still in progress in order to recover the current latency in Live Reporting data, this impacts only contacts-related data widgets. No impact on calls, routing, or any of the critical functionality. In the meantime, the "Call reports" in Explore can provide an alternate view of the live data with a short delay. Our engineering team is currently applying mitigation measures. We will provide an update within 30 minutes

Aug 14, 21:53 UTC
Update - Additional mitigation measures are in progress in order to recover the current latency in Live Reporting data, this impacts only contacts-related data widgets. No impact on calls, routing, or any of the critical functionality. In the meantime, the "Recent Activity Multichannel Default Dashboard" in Explore can provide an alternate view of the live data with a short delay. Our engineering team is currently applying mitigation measures. We will provide an update within 30 minutes

Aug 14, 21:23 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating an issue impacting Live Reporting data latency, this impacts only contacts related data widgets. No impact on calls, routing, or any of the critical functionality. In the meantime, the "Recent Activity Multichannel Default Dashboard" in Explore can provide an alternate view of the live data with a short delay. Our engineering team is currently applying mitigation measures. We will provide an update within 30 minutes

Aug 14, 20:59 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating an issue impacting Live Reporting data latency. No impact on calls, routing, or any of the critical functionality. In the meantime, the "Recent Activity Multichannel Default Dashboard" in Explore can provide an alternate view of the live data with a short delay. Our engineering team is currently applying mitigation measures. We will provide an update within 30 minutes

item.title: Outbound calls degraded performance in US Region
item.content:encoded:
Jun 22, 16:35 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 22, 16:34 UTC
Monitoring - Mitigation measures are in place and we are seeing system recovery. We are currently monitoring the system. We will provide an update in 30 min or sooner.

Jun 22, 16:29 UTC
Update - Mitigation measures are in progress and we are currently seeing recovery. Inbound calls are working as expected. We will provide an update within 15 minutes.

Jun 22, 16:13 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an issue with Outbound calls in the US regional deployment. Outbound calls are successful, but only the mute and calls controls are available. Inbound calls are working as expected. We will provide an update within 15 minutes.

item.title: Unable to login to Conversation App - US Region
item.content:encoded:
Jun 14, 21:08 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 14, 20:57 UTC
Monitoring - Mitigation measures are in place and we are seeing system recovery. Customers who have enabled Business Continuity can disable the same. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

Jun 14, 20:38 UTC
Update - Mitigation measures are currently in progress and we are seeing system improvements. Additionally, a subset of users in our Europe and Canada regional deployment may experience intermittent errors on the conversation app. We will provide another update within 15 minutes.

Jun 14, 20:27 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an issue where some users in the US regional deployment are receiving 500 errors when navigating through the workspace apps. We recommend customers enable a Business Continuity plan. Mitigation measures are currently in progress. We will provide an update within 15 minutes.

Jun 14, 20:17 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an issue where some users in the US regional deployment are receiving 500 errors when navigating through the workspace apps. We recommend customers enable a Business Continuity plan. We are working with our engineering team to investigate the root cause. We will provide an update within 15 minutes.

item.title: User are experiencing issues opening Conversations APP
item.content:encoded:
May 19, 00:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 19, 00:11 UTC
Monitoring - We are currently monitoring the situation. The system is exhibiting normal operating values. We will keep monitoring the incident with our partner. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

May 19, 00:05 UTC
Update - We are currently working with our partner in order to resolve the incident. At this point we are seeing 90% recovery, customers can still experience intermittent login difficulties. For customers who are able to login in can receive and place phone calls. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

May 19, 00:02 UTC
Update - We are currently working with our partner in order to resolve the incident. At this point we start to see recovery, customers can still experience intermittent login difficulties. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

May 18, 23:57 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating issues opening Conversation APP and Callbar. This is currently affecting all regions. We recommend customers enable a Business Continuity plan. This is caused because of an incident reported by a 3rd party provider. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

May 18, 23:40 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating issues opening Conversation APP and Callbar. This is currently affecting all regions. We recommend customers enable a Business Continuity plan. This is caused because of an incident reported by a 3rd party provider. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

May 18, 23:37 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating issues opening Conversation APP and Callbar. This is currently affecting all regions. Routing and call controls are working as expected. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

item.title: Users in the US region are experiencing a intermittent 500 error in Workspace
item.content:encoded:
May 5, 19:14 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 5, 19:09 UTC
Monitoring - We have applied mitigation steps and we are seeing improvements once more. We will provide an update shortly.

May 5, 19:06 UTC
Investigating - We are seeing an increase in error rates and a reoccurrence of 500 errors. We are investigating these error rate spikes with our engineering team. We will provide an update within 15 minutes.

item.title: Users in the US region are experiencing a intermittent 500 error in Workspace
item.content:encoded:
May 5, 18:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 5, 18:43 UTC
Monitoring - At this time, we are no longer seeing a large volume of errors, and the impact seems to be mitigated. We are monitoring this behavior alongside our engineering team to understand the root cause and to prevent a reoccurrence. We will continue to monitor this for recovery.

May 5, 18:27 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an issue where some users in the US regional deployment are receiving 500 errors when navigating through the workspace apps. This error is intermittent. We are working with our engineering team to investigate the root cause. We will provide an update within 15 minutes.

item.title: Unable to login to Conversation App
item.content:encoded:
Apr 27, 16:53 UTC
Resolved - We are now seeing recovery and the impact is mitigated.

Apr 27, 16:39 UTC
Monitoring - We have applied mitigation measures to an issue with loading and logging into Conversations in the US region and we are seeing improvements. We are currently monitoring our system to ensure a smooth recovery. We will provide another update within 30 minutes.

Apr 27, 16:27 UTC
Update - We have applied mitigation measures to an issue with loading and logging into Conversations in the US region, specifically within US instances. Users logged in previously to this event should be able to still receive and answer calls. Some agents may also be changed to offline status due to failing heartbeats. These users should be able to refresh. We are currently monitoring the system for improvements. We will provide another update within 30 minutes.

Apr 27, 15:59 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue with loading and logging into Conversations in the US region. Users logged in previously to this event should be able to still receive and answer calls. We are still investigating this behavior alongside our engineering team. We will provide another update within 30 minutes.

Apr 27, 15:48 UTC
Investigating - We are aware of a problem right now affecting some customers' ability to access Talkdesk Conversation app. Our engineering team is investigating the root cause. We will provide another update ASAP.

item.title: Workspace disconnected until refresh - US and EU Region
item.content:encoded:
Mar 15, 10:00 UTC
Resolved - We have experienced a small subset of calls reporting device unavailable for some agents, no calls were lost during the incident timeframe, and these affected calls were routed to another available agents. Agents that were experiencing this behavior were recommended to refresh Workspace in order to mitigate the issue. At this time, mitigation measures were applied and the system recovered to normal values.

item.title: Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Mar 8, 23:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 8, 23:30 UTC
Update - We are currently monitoring this behavior after applying mitigation measures. We are seeing recovery in our systems and improvements in the majority of user instances, but it will take some time for the delay to fully normalize. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 22:41 UTC
Update - We are currently monitoring this behavior after applying mitigation measures. We are seeing recovery in our systems and improvements in some user instances, but it will take some time for the delay to fully normalize. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 22:11 UTC
Update - We are currently monitoring this behavior after applying mitigation measures. We are seeing recovery in our systems, but it will take some time for the delay to normalize. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 21:41 UTC
Update - We are currently monitoring this behavior after applying mitigation measures. We are seeing recovery in our systems, but it will take some time for the delay to normalize. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 21:26 UTC
Monitoring - We are currently monitoring this behavior after applying mitigation measures. We are seeing recovery in our systems, but it will take some time for the delay to normalize. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 21:12 UTC
Update - We are still investigating delays in reporting in specific Live widgets that use Voice Contact data, all other Live widgets work as expected. Routing and Calls are working as expected with no impact. This is in the US region only. No Impact in EMEA, CA regions. At this time, we are investigating the cause of this issue and attempting to apply mitigation measures. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 20:57 UTC
Update - We are still investigating delays in reporting in specific Live widgets that use Voice Contact data, all other Live widgets work as expected. Routing and Calls are working as expected with no impact. This is in the US region only. No Impact in EMEA, CA regions. At this time, we are investigating the cause of this issue and attempting to apply mitigation measures. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 20:41 UTC
Update - We are still investigating delays in reporting in specific Live widgets that use Voice Contact data. This is only impacting "Contacts" widgets (excluding digital contacts), other widgets in Live will be functioning as expected. Routing and Calls are working as expected with no impact. This is in the US region only. No Impact in EMEA, CA regions. At this time, we are investigating the cause of this issue and attempting to apply mitigation measures. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 20:25 UTC
Update - We are still investigating delays in reporting in specific Live widgets that use Voice Contact data. Routing and Calls are working as expected with no impact. This is in the US region only. No Impact in EMEA, CA regions. At this time, we are investigating the cause of this issue and attempting to apply mitigation measures. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

Mar 8, 20:07 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating delays in reporting in specific Live widgets that use Voice Contact data. Routing and Calls are working as expected with NO impact. This is in the US region only. No Impact in EMEA, CA regions. At this time, we are investigating the cause of this issue. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

item.title: Live Dashboards not Updating
item.content:encoded:
Nov 29, 17:52 UTC
Resolved - Mitigation measures were applied and we are seeing improvements. The system is still consuming all the pending events, therefore the Agent Status in Live is currently changing however still experiencing latency.

Nov 29, 17:28 UTC
Monitoring - Mitigation measures were applied and we are seeing improvements. We will provide an update in the next 15 min.

Nov 29, 17:22 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating degraded performance across Live Dashboards, all critical functionality including making and receiving calls is working as expected. Mitigation Measures are in progress. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.

Nov 29, 17:15 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating degraded performance across Live Dashboards. Mitigation Measures are in progress. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or sooner.
